metadata.name: Chashitsu 001 GA type shoin
metadata.description:
────────────

It's a long time ago.
In a world where the custom of creating letters had died out, there were people who tried to revive it.
The letters on this hanging scroll are the first ones.
"They who believe in themselves are the true image of a person.
That's what it means.

Thanks for coming today.
Let's talk slowly.

────────────

As a holder benefit, you will get a Unity 3D asset.
This asset is optimized for the Metaverse and can be placed as a room on various platforms.
Enjoy your own special space.

There is also an OpenSea collection of the same project.
Please enjoy them as well.
https://opensea.io/collection/ht100d?search[sortAscending]=true&search[sortBy]=CREATED_DATE

HYPERTEXT 100.0
The project to update letters with new concepts.
In this project, we are creating new Kanji characters.
We will update the resolution of the language by creating new characters that assume new concepts of today and lifestyles in the distant future.
